replies.body: It starts at 11AM AEST on the 22nd April.

This, though for OCE it has breaks between 3AM and 11AM on both Saturday and Sunday (because it "interferes with the Twisted Treeline queue").

EDIT: Turns out URF will be an exception to this "rule" as it's going to be available throughout the weekend instead of having breaks {[source](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/B8mfGyVA-schedule-change-for-urf-this-weekend)}.
